response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. I understand that the true worth of this item may be subjective and deeply personal to you, which is why I am offering it at a special introductory price. Considering its exceptional quality and rarity, I propose a purchase price of $750,000. This offer represents a significant discount compared to its market value, allowing you to secure a piece that could potentially appreciate in value over time. I look forward to discussing the details further and exploring how we might reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Please let me know if you have any questions or if there's anything else I can provide to assist you in making your decision.", "product_price": 750000}
